prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek, aquatic body and a playful demeanor.
I want a creature resembling a cute sea animal, primarily in blue and white shades.
Generate a Pokemon with fins and a long tail, evoking a sense of elegance and grace.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in water, with a soft, friendly expression and gentle features.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into ocean environments, showcasing vibrant blue and teal colors.
Design a mystical creature with a mermaid-like appearance, combining water and elegance.
Show me a Pokemon with an aquatic theme, featuring fins, a long body, and a bright color palette.
